mapper.select: SELECT mr.`number` as mrnumber ,ca.`carNumber` as cacarnumber ,ca.`frameNumber` as caframenumber , ca.`carId` as cacarid ,dc.`carBrandName` as dccarbrandname ,ca.`engineNumber` as caenginenumber , deb.`engineBrandName` as debenginebrandname ,fc.`paymentType`, cc.`name` as ccname ,ca.`carer` as cacarer , cc.`phone` as ccphone ,ca.`mileage` as camileage , mr.`type` mrtype , mr.`workTime` as mrworktime ,mr.`getMan` as mrgetman , mr.`overWorkDate` as mroverworkdate ,mr.`completeDate` as mrcompletedate, mr.`company` as mrcompany ,cc.`counselorName` as cccounselorname , mr.`beforedate` as mrbeforedate ,mr.`price` as mrprice ,mr.`remark` as mrremark ,mr.`state` as mrstate, cc.`number` as ccnumber , ca.`clientId` as caclientid , deb.`id` as debid ,dc.`id` as dcid FROM `front_cashier` AS fc STRAIGHT_JOIN `client_clientdata` AS cc ON fc.`clientId` = cc.`number` STRAIGHT_JOIN `maintain_repair` AS mr ON fc.`number` = mr.`number` STRAIGHT_JOIN `client_carinfo` AS ca ON cc.`number` = ca.`clientId` STRAIGHT_JOIN `data_engine_brand` AS deb ON ca.`engineId` = deb.`id` STRAIGHT_JOIN `data_carbrand` AS dc ON ca.`carBrandId` = dc.`id` WHERE mr.`number` = #{number}

SELECT mr.`number` as mrnumber ,ca.`carNumber` as cacarnumber , ca.`carId` as cacarid ,dc.`carBrandName` as dccarbrandname, deb.`engineBrandName` as debenginebrandname,fc.`paymentType`, cc.`name` as ccname ,ca.`carer` as cacarer , cc.`phone` as ccphone ,ca.`mileage` as camileage , mr.`type` mrtype ,mr.`address` as mraddress ,mr.`rescueAddress` as mrrescueaddress , mr.`workTime` as mrworktime ,mr.`car` as mrcar , mr.`completeDate` as mrcompletedate ,pa.`artisanClassName` as paartisanclassname , mr.`company` as mrcompany ,cc.`counselorName` as cccounselorname , mr.`price` as mrprice ,mr.`remark` as mrremark ,mr.`state` as mrstate, cc.`number` as ccnumber , ca.`clientId` as caclientid , deb.`id` as debid ,dc.`id` as dcid , pa.`artisanClassId` as paartisanclassid FROM `front_cashier` AS fc STRAIGHT_JOIN `client_clientdata` AS cc ON fc.`clientId` = cc.`number` STRAIGHT_JOIN `maintain_rescue` AS mr ON fc.`number` = mr.`number` STRAIGHT_JOIN `client_carinfo` AS ca ON cc.`number` = ca.`clientId` STRAIGHT_JOIN `data_engine_brand` AS deb ON ca.`engineId` = deb.`id` STRAIGHT_JOIN `data_carbrand` AS dc ON ca.`carBrandId` = dc.`carBrandName` STRAIGHT_JOIN `personnel_artisanclass` AS pa ON mr.`rescueTeamId` = pa.`artisanClassId` WHERE mr.`number` = #{number}

SELECT fc.`cashierId` ,fc.`invoiceId`, fc.`paymentType`,mr.`status` as mrstatus , fc.`settlementStatus`,fc.`cashierTime`, pa.`artisanName` as paartisanname ,fc.`totalNum`, cc.`name` as ccname ,ca.`carNumber` as cacarnumber , dc.`carTypeName` as dccartypename ,ca.`frameNumber` as caframenumber , cc.`phone` as ccphone ,ca.`jqinsurance` as cajqinsurance , mr.`company` as mrcompany ,cc.`counselorName` as cccounselorname , mr.`completeDate` as mrcompletedate ,mr.`remark` as mrremark ,tname , pa.`artisanId` as paartisanid ,ca.`clientId` as caclientid , dc.`id` as dcid , cc.`number` as ccnumber ,mr.`number` as mrnumber FROM `front_cashier` AS fc STRAIGHT_JOIN `client_clientdata` AS cc ON fc.`clientId` = cc.`number` STRAIGHT_JOIN ( SELECT mrp.`number`,mrp.`completeDate`,mrp.`status`,mrp.`company`,mrp.`remark`,'维修单' AS tname FROM `maintain_repair` AS mrp UNION ALL SELECT mrs.`number`,mrs.`completeDate`,mrs.`status`,mrs.`company`,mrs.`remark`,'救援单' AS tname FROM `maintain_rescue` AS mrs ) AS mr ON fc.`number` = mr.`number` STRAIGHT_JOIN `personnel_artisan` AS pa ON fc.`staffId` = pa.`artisanId` STRAIGHT_JOIN `client_carinfo` AS ca ON cc.`number` = ca.`clientId` STRAIGHT_JOIN `data_car` AS dc ON ca.`carId` = dc.`id` WHERE fc.`cashierId` LIKE #{cashierId} AND mr.`status` LIKE #{status} AND ca.`carNumber` LIKE #{carNumber} AND cc.`name` LIKE #{name} AND cc.`counselorName` LIKE #{counselorName} AND tname LIKE #{tname} AND fc.`settlementStatus` = #{settlementStatus} AND mr.`remark` LIKE #{remark}
mapper.sql: cashierId, totalNum, settlementStatus, paymentType, invoiceId, cashierTime, staffId, onCredit, clientId, change, vipBalance, number, default1, default2
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from front_cashier
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into front_cashier (cashierId, totalNum, settlementStatus, paymentType, invoiceId, cashierTime, staffId, onCredit, clientId, change, vipBalance, number, default1, default2) values (#{cashierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalnum,jdbcType=REAL}, #{settlementstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cashiertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{staffid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oncredit,jdbcType=REAL}, #{clientid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{change,jdbcType=REAL}, #{vipbalance,jdbcType=REAL}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{default1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{default2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into front_cashier
cashierId,
totalNum,
settlementStatus,
paymentType,
invoiceId,
cashierTime,
staffId,
onCredit,
clientId,
change,
vipBalance,
number,
default1,
default2,

mapper.update:
update front_cashier
cashierId = #{record.cashierid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
totalNum = #{record.totalnum,jdbcType=REAL},
settlementStatus = #{record.settlementstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paymentType = #{record.paymenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invoiceId = #{record.invoiceid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cashierTime = #{record.cashiertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
staffId = #{record.staffid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
onCredit = #{record.oncredit,jdbcType=REAL},
clientId = #{record.clientid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
change = #{record.change,jdbcType=REAL},
vipBalance = #{record.vipbalance,jdbcType=REAL},
number = #{record.number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
default1 = #{record.default1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
default2 = #{record.default2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update front_cashier set cashierId = #{record.cashierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, totalNum = #{record.totalnum,jdbcType=REAL}, settlementStatus = #{record.settlementstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paymentType = #{record.paymenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoiceId = #{record.invoiceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cashierTime = #{record.cashiertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, staffId = #{record.staffid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, onCredit = #{record.oncredit,jdbcType=REAL}, clientId = #{record.clientid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, change = #{record.change,jdbcType=REAL}, vipBalance = #{record.vipbalance,jdbcType=REAL}, number = #{record.number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, default1 = #{record.default1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, default2 = #{record.default2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update front_cashier
totalNum = #{totalnum,jdbcType=REAL},
settlementStatus = #{settlementstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paymentType = #{paymenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invoiceId = #{invoiceid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cashierTime = #{cashiertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
staffId = #{staffid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
onCredit = #{oncredit,jdbcType=REAL},
clientId = #{clientid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
change = #{change,jdbcType=REAL},
vipBalance = #{vipbalance,jdbcType=REAL},
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
default1 = #{default1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
default2 = #{default2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where cashierId = #{cashierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update front_cashier set totalNum = #{totalnum,jdbcType=REAL}, settlementStatus = #{settlementstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paymentType = #{paymenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoiceId = #{invoiceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cashierTime = #{cashiertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, staffId = #{staffid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, onCredit = #{oncredit,jdbcType=REAL}, clientId = #{clientid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, change = #{change,jdbcType=REAL}, vipBalance = #{vipbalance,jdbcType=REAL}, number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, default1 = #{default1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, default2 = #{default2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cashierId = #{cashierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
